event CurveCreated(address indexed owner, address indexed curveAddr)
event OwnershipTransferred(address indexed previousOwner, address indexed newOwner)
function createCurve(string _name, string _symbol, address _creator, uint256 _creatorRate, uint256 _initMintPrice, address _erc20, uint256 _m, uint256 _n, uint256 _d, string _baseUri)
